passive.name: SALVATION
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) SALVATION
                                Soraka gains 100% Movement Speed when moving toward allied champions below 35% Health.

q.name: (Q) STARCALL
q.description:
(Q) STARCALL
 7/6/5/4s   45/50/55/60 
                                
                                
                                Calls a star, dealing 60 magic damage (60/110/160/210 + 40% ) and slowing by 30% for 2 seconds. If an enemy champion is hit, reduces the cooldown of Astral Infusion by 2 seconds. Soraka also gains Rejuvenation, healing for 60 (60/90/120/150 + 45% ) over 2.5 seconds.After healing an ally champion 3 times, Starcall is empowered to deal 140% damage in a larger area.

w.name: (W) ASTRAL INFUSION
w.description:
(W) ASTRAL INFUSION
 7/6/5/4s   55/60/65/70 
                                
                                
                                Heals an allied champion for 50 (50/85/120/155 + 55% ).Excess healing is converted into a shield with a maximum shield value of 50 (50/85/120/155 + 55% ).

e.name: (E) EQUINOX
e.description:
(E) EQUINOX
 20/18/16/14s   70 
                                
                                
                                Create a zone that deals 70 magic damage (70/120/170/220 + 40% ) and silences enemies. The zone expires after 1.5 seconds, dealing 70 magic damage (70/120/170/220 + 40% ) and rooting for 1.25/1.5/1.75/2 second(s).

r.name: (R) WISH
r.description:
(R) WISH
 85/80/75s   100 
                                
                                
                                Heals all allied champions for 150 (150/225/300 + 45% ), increase by 50% if the ally is below 35% Health.
